name: Mirror AI
headline: App that turns selfie photos into thousand emoji that look like youâ¦
description: Mirror Emoji Keyboard by Mirror AI is an app that takes a photo of your face and creates you a set of personalized emoji. You get hundreds of them ready to be shared on messengers or social networks.

founders.name: Evgeny Kuryshev, Founder
founders.description: Worked at Yandex, co-founded Emerging Travel Group, co-founder at Mirror AI

# Make Your Personalised Emoji Stickers
Take one selfie and get thousands of personal cartoon emojis of you and your friends. Use them in any messenger.
[![App Store Logo - Apps Webflow Template](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ea2cc8589878bcd7d5dd46/63ea2cc858987892f0d5dd80_app-store-button.svg)](http://mirror-ai.com/<https:/itunes.apple.com/us/app/mirror-emoji-keyboard/id1199126741?ls=1&mt=8>)[![Google Play Logo - Apps Webflow Template](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ea2cc8589878bcd7d5dd46/63ea2cc858987833dfd5dd83_play-store-button.svg)](http://mirror-ai.com/<https:/play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.mirrorai.app>)[![Google Play Logo - Apps Webflow Template](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ea2cc8589878bcd7d5dd46/63ea6b5c894e62243a926274_appgallery.svg)](http://mirror-ai.com/<https:/appgallery.huawei.com/app/C103577907>)

Features
## Make messaging more fun and personal
![Team Collaboration - App Webflow Template](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ea2cc8589878bcd7d5dd46/63ed02668984cb06c510b424_block1.png)
![Team Collaboration Icon - App Webflow Template](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ea2cc8589878bcd7d5dd46/63ed03439fa778540d63861a_face-scanner%201.svg)
### Create An Emoji Of Yourself
Create a cartoon character avatar that looks just like you by taking a single selfie and using Mirror AI's advanced face recognition technology.
![Built-in Integrations Icon - App Webflow Template](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ea2cc8589878bcd7d5dd46/63ed034dd72246438252e3d5_sticker%203.svg)
### More than 1000 stickers that can be used with popular messaging apps.
Access over 1000 emoji stickers that feature your cartoon emoji in various situations and with memes, all translated into multiple languages.
![Built-in Integrations - App Webflow Template](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ea2cc8589878bcd7d5dd46/63f33c51e5b3e084acb0cad5_blocks4_.png)
### And many more amazing features!
![Whatsapp Stickers in 20 Languages](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ea2cc8589878bcd7d5dd46/63f331698a2d47eac9be5a1e_1.png)
#### 20 Major Languages
Express yourself in your native language and enjoy personalized emoji
![Emotions for your avatar](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ea2cc8589878bcd7d5dd46/63f3317348a58b7e40c79e2c_2.png)
#### 40+ emotions for your avatar
Avatars can express a wide range of emotions, helping you convey your feelings
![Whatsapp Stickers with Friends](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ea2cc8589878bcd7d5dd46/63f331a985872a28eea515df_3.png)
#### Stickers with Friends
Two characters that look like you and your friend, so you can add a personal touch to your chat
![Whatsapp stickers with custom text](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ea2cc8589878bcd7d5dd46/63f331bfdd42adc60376813d_4.png)
#### Stickers with your text
Write anything you want on your personal sticker and share it with your friend
![Create custom whatsapp stickers and sticker packs](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ea2cc8589878bcd7d5dd46/63f331dacdf34e68f4c2c670_5.png)
#### Create Sticker Packs
You can easily create your own sticker packs and use them in apps like WhatsApp and Telegram
![Custom Emoji Stickers Keyboard](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ea2cc8589878bcd7d5dd46/63f33202a511aa8bc3a909fb_6.png)
#### Emoji Keyboard
Expressive stickers that are just a tap away. Install emoji keyboard on iOs or Android
## Powerful AI Avatar Builder
Edit your avatar with wide range of customization options, including clothing, hairstyles, hats, accessories, skin tone, and more, allowing you to create a personalized avatar that truly represents you.
[Download App](http://mirror-ai.com/<#Download-App>)
![AI Cartoon Avatar Builder](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ea2cc8589878bcd7d5dd46/64ca3cb3ac73b18df9d6b73e_chars2.webp)
FAQS
## Frequently Asked Questions
Have questions? We’ve answers. If you can’t find what we are looking for, feel free to [get in touch](http://mirror-ai.com/<#Message>).
**What is Mirror AI?**
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ea2cc8589878bcd7d5dd46/63ea2cc858987852acd5ddb5_plus-icon.svg)
Mirror AI is a mobile app that uses AI-powered face detection technology to create a personalized cartoon character that looks just like you. Access tons of fun and expressive stickers with your character that you can share on popular messaging apps.
**How do I use Mirror AI?**
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ea2cc8589878bcd7d5dd46/63ea2cc858987852acd5ddb5_plus-icon.svg)
Using Mirror AI is easy. Simply download the app from the App Store or Google Play, take a selfie, and let the app's AI-powered technology do the rest. You can then customize your character's appearance and use the stickers in your favorite messaging apps.
What kind of stickers Mirror AI has?
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ea2cc8589878bcd7d5dd46/63ea2cc858987852acd5ddb5_plus-icon.svg)
Mirror AI offers a variety of sticker styles that you can use to express yourself in fun and creative ways. From love and romance to phrases and expressions, Mirror AI has a sticker for every occasion.
**Can I use Mirror AI on different messaging apps?**
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ea2cc8589878bcd7d5dd46/63ea2cc858987852acd5ddb5_plus-icon.svg)
Yes, Mirror AI supports a wide range of messaging apps. You can easily create and share your personalized stickers and sticker packs in WhatsApp, Telegram, iMessage, and more.
**How can I share my stickers with others?**
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ea2cc8589878bcd7d5dd46/63ea2cc858987852acd5ddb5_plus-icon.svg)
You can share your stickers with others by creating sticker packs and sharing them with your friends and family. You can also use the stickers in your own social media posts, such as Instagram stories.
**Is there a cost to use Mirror AI?**
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ea2cc8589878bcd7d5dd46/63ea2cc858987852acd5ddb5_plus-icon.svg)
Mirror AI offers a free version of the app with limited features, but you can unlock all stickers and remove the background and watermark by subscribing to Mirror AI's premium version. Mirror AI also offers physical merchandise such as t-shirts and mugs that can be purchased through the app's Gifts store.
**How secure is Mirror AI?**
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ea2cc8589878bcd7d5dd46/63ea2cc858987852acd5ddb5_plus-icon.svg)
Mirror AI takes your privacy and security seriously. All of your data is securely stored and encrypted, and the app does not store or share any of your personal information. Additionally, Mirror AI adheres to strict privacy policies and standards to ensure that your data is safe and secure.
![Mirror Business Logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ea2cc8589878bcd7d5dd46/63f481772df04b5e544e4c6c_mirror_business.svg)
Empower Your Business Communication with Mirror AI's Personalized Stickers and API

generated_description:
**Mirror AI: Transforming Selfies into Personalized Emojis**

**Overview:**  
Mirror AI, founded in 2017 and based in San Francisco, is a fascinating startup that kickstarted its journey as the Mirror Emoji Keyboard. The core idea? An app that takes a selfie and generates thousands of unique emojis that resemble you. This concept not only taps into the fun factor of emojis but also personalizes the way we communicate online. We're talking about emojis tailored to you—how cool is that?

**Mission:**  
Mirror AI's mission is straightforward: to make messaging more engaging and personal by allowing users to create cartoon-like avatars from their selfies, complete with hundreds of stickers ready for sharing on messaging platforms or social media.

**The Product:**  
At its heart, the Mirror AI app leverages advanced computer vision technologies to create a cartoon avatar that looks just like you, using just one selfie. With over 1,000 expressive stickers at your disposal—translated into multiple languages—you can convey your emotions and ideas vividly. The app supports a plethora of messaging platforms such as WhatsApp, Telegram, iMessage, and more.

**Features Worth Noting:**
- **AI Facial Recognition**: Seamlessly transforms your photo into a cartoon avatar.
- **Custom Stickers**: Create unique stickers featuring your avatar, including options for text and varied expressions.
- **Stick Packs**: Easily make and share sticker packs with friends for fun and personalized chats.
- **Multi-Platform Access**: Use the stickers across various applications without hassle.

**Business Model & Future Aspirations:**  
Currently, with a lean team of just 7 members and part of Y Combinator’s Batch W17, Mirror AI is enhancing user experience through additional features, such as webinars, audio chats, and custom styles. They’re also keen on empowering businesses with personalized sticker APIs, expanding their reach beyond individual users.

**Contact and Accessibility:**  
Mirror AI is easy to access—with free versions available on both iOS and Android, plus options for Huawei devices. Interested individuals can dive in by visiting [Mirror AI's website](http://mirror-ai.com) for more details and to download the app.

**Conclusion:**  
Mirror AI embodies a modern twist on digital communication, harnessing the charm of emojis into a personalized experience tailored for every individual. In a world where visual communication is ever-increasing, Mirror AI is not only keeping up—it's pushing the boundaries of how we express ourselves in the digital realm. If you haven't tried it yet, it might just be the fun upgrade your messaging game needs!
